00024 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_ErrorCheck_SimpleCaptcha extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractErrorCheck {

00034         public function check(&$check,$name,&$gp) {
00035                 $checkFailed = "";
00036                 if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('simple_captcha')) {
00037                         require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('simple_captcha', 'class.tx_simplecaptcha.php'));
00038                         $simpleCaptcha_className = t3lib_div::makeInstanceClassName('tx_simplecaptcha');
00039                         $this->simpleCaptcha = new $simpleCaptcha_className();
00040                         if (!$this->simpleCaptcha->checkCaptcha()) {
00041                                 $checkFailed = $this->getCheckFailed($check);
00042                         }
00043                 }
00044                 return $checkFailed;
00045         }
